entry.title: Hospital Scout Group runs activities for young patients
entry.content: Find out how a hospital based Scout Group is bringing adventure to young patients and read tips for setting up a Group in a hospital.

entry.title: Allan Simpson: Our candidate for the European Scout Committee
entry.content: Read about Allan Simpson's mission to help revitalise, refocus and reconnect the European Scout Region.

entry.title: 10 tips for attending a Pride parade with Scouts
entry.content: We spoke to Jordan, from Blackpool Scouts, and Kayleigh, from Scouts in Northern Ireland, about their going to Pride parades with Scouts.

entry.title: Collaboration to strengthen safeguarding: National Working Group (NWG) and Scouts partner for trauma-informed practices
entry.content: Scouts partner with the National Working Group as part of our commitment to involve survivors in our learning and resource development.

entry.title: Welcoming our new Chief Volunteer of Wales, Jon Williams
entry.content: UK Chief Volunteer Carl Hankinson, is delighted to announce the appointment of Jon Williams as the new Chief Volunteer of Wales.

entry.title: New Scout and Explorer Money Skills Activity badges have launched with HSBC!
entry.content: We're helping young people to learn more about money, from budgeting and interest rates to cryptocurrency and financial risks.
